subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Another Test
msgSnippet: This is great!  I like the practice at reading QS, but I don t think I can write it: the Mac OS X Mail program only supports plain or rich text for sending
messageBody:
This is great! I like the practice at reading QS, but I don't think I
can write it: the Mac OS X "Mail" program only supports plain or rich
text for sending messages. This is what happens when I try to send a
rich text message: Hs z ` hApaz `eG F trF t seGd a ric [ekt mesag.

On 13 Sep 2004, at 11:45, Jeff Smith wrote:
> His iz a fynt test.

This is great!  I like the practice at reading QS, but I don't think I 
can write it: the Mac OS X "Mail" program only supports plain or rich 
text for sending messages.  This is what happens when I try to send a 
rich text message: Hs z ` hApaz `eG F trF t seGd a ric [ekt mesag.

On 13 Sep 2004, at 11:45, Jeff Smith wrote:
> His iz a fynt test.

can write it: the Mac OS X "Mail" program only supports plain or rich
text for sending messages.  This is what happens when I try to send a

seGd a ric [ekt mesag.</fontfamily>
